function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Influence of implementing quarantine with different intensities and intervention times to mitigate COVID-19 spread.","Impact":"Ineffective quarantine measures may lead to continued spread of COVID-19 and failure to control the epidemic.","Mitigation":"Implementing sufficiently intense quarantine measures and adjusting intervention times based on population movement and distribution.","Technologies":"Geospatial technology for population tracking and movement analysis.","People":"General population at risk of continued COVID-19 spread.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, and policymakers."}]}
